tdt.note: fixed: `ignore_case_list` can have either PRB or Incident. Previously it was working only with PRB when a tierless case had also PRB

changelog.0.8.2_beta:
08.01.2024:
        - Added: Decode PCMD values to human-readable format and dump output to console or to a text file (support for: MME/SGSN/AMF) 
        - Added: Script can be now added to `PATH` in order to be able to be executed from any directory directly! (Thx to Ciprian!) 
        - Added: Script can now decode directly 'console' (`stdin`) text which can be 'piped' to `pcmd_parser.py` (Thx to Ciprian!)
changelog.0.7.1_beta: 27.12.2023 - a) Support for last(X)Pcmd parsing of 'top contributors' depending on 'PCMD version', b) check online for changelog/updates, c) bug fixes
changelog.0.5.3_beta: 29.11.2023 - first beta version for internal testing within 3LS

cmmlogcollect.note: added: Support for automatic check for online updates

test.note: extra note that might be need to be communicated as well
test.comment: extra comment: needed as extra description for admin purposes / not displayed or parsed locally

changelog.1.2.0: 120 version major updates & new features added...
